sentences.sContent: Defect: Compare enervated , do not easily, treat water or insolate wait to be out of shape possibly.
sentences.sContent_eng: Defect: Compare enervated , do not easily, treat water or insolate wait to be out of shape possibly.
sentences.sCn: 缺点：比较娇贵，不轻易打理，遇水或暴晒等都可能变形。

sentences.sContent: Food supplies, the prevention: insolate to reduce food supplies, adjust the water temperature, the implementation of the warehouse warehouse management.
sentences.sContent_eng: Food supplies, the prevention: insolate to reduce food supplies, adjust the water temperature, the implementation of the warehouse warehouse management.
sentences.sCn: 防治法：曝晒贮粮，以降低贮粮水分，调节仓库温度，实施仓库科学管理。

words.tran: 日晒；日光浴；[内科] 中暑；[内科] 日射病

trans.tranOther: to expose to sunlight, as for bleaching
